package.name: GoodGreyNames
package.description: An Adium chat style theme from the Adiumxtras site.
package.long:
Author: "My take on what a good grey message style should be. unlike my other message style, I made this one almost completely from scratch and I'm happy to try to fix and bugs or make any improvements you might suggest."
This theme is available at http://www.adiumxtras.com/index.php?a=xtras&xtra_id=986
